channel.title: Swift on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku
channel.description: Recent content in Swift on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku

item.title: Perl Weekly Challenge - Guest Contributions
item.description: As you know, “Perl Weekly Challenge”, primarily focus on Perl and Raku. During the Week #018, we received the solution to “Perl Weekly Challenge - 018” by Orestis Zekai in Python. It was a pleasant surprise to receive solution in something other than Perl and Raku. Ever since regular team members also started contributing in other languages like APL, Awk, Bash, C, C++, Elm, Erlang, Go, Haskell, HTML, Idris, Java, Javascript, Lisp, Node, Postscript, Prolog, R, Ruby, Rust, Swift and Tcl.

item.title: BLOG: The Weekly Challenge #073
BLOG: The Weekly Challenge #072
item.description: HEADLINE No Linked List related task this week? I am glad, this week focus was more Array/List related. Technical speaking Array and List aren’t the same in Perl. I must admit until I read the article by brian d foy, I thought they were the same. As the famous saying, you learn something new every day. Both the tasks, this week were not terribly difficult. I noticed many members of Team PWC attempted other languages because they finished the tasks in no time.
